item.title: CIA Triad
item.description: Table of Contents Definition Confidentiality Integrity Availability How a Hacker sees a network Confidentiality Integrity Availability How an Admin sees a network Confidentiality Integrity Availability Definition Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability, aka the CIA triad, is a model designed to guide policies for information security within an organisation. The Goal of the Triad? when we want to protect a network and the data contained within it.
